testcase.name: Validating the URL - Redirect Filter functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Enter the "mmarimuthu@vmware.com" and "Leavemealone@2401".............passed When User is on home page...................................................passed Then Click on the profile icon..............................................passed Then Click on the Admin option..............................................passed Then Click on Selfservice option from leftNavigation panel..................passed Then Click on URL Redirect Option...........................................passed Then Verify the Source URL field is loaded..................................passed Then Filter the Status option by Enabled....................................passed Then Search for the SourceURL_filter - Available...........................passed And Disable SourceURL_filter is available..................................passed Then Enter the value for SourceURL_filter...................................passed Then Enter the value for TargetURL_filter...................................passed Then Select the Date value..................................................passed Then Click on POST button...................................................passed Then Click on Confirm button................................................passed Then Verify the error-sucess message........................................passed Then Click on close button in the pop up....................................passed Then Verify the created URLfilter redirect..................................passed Then Filter by Enabled Status...............................................passed Then Filter by All Status...................................................passed Then Filter by Disabled Status..............................................passed
